1.0.name: wordpress/easy-relative-date
1.0.description: Easy Relative Date is a simple plugin to add relative date supports on wordpress powered websites, like 'Today', 'Yesterday', '2 Days Ago', '2 Weeks Ago', '2 'Seconds Ago', '2 Minutes Ago', '2 Hours Ago'. The main advantage of the plugin is that it doesn't override standard wordpress the_date() and the_time() functions, so you can use these functions if you need as well.
